title: FS: 1887 Roger Connor (HOF) Buchner Gold Coin "SOLD"
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1887 Roger Connor (HOF) Buchner Gold Coin "SOLD"
posts.post_content:
Greetings collectors. Offered for sale is a nice 1887 Buchner Gold Coin card of hall of famer Roger Connor. Card exhibits wear around the edges, some minor wrinkles and bright color. Card is skinned, I imagine it lost it's backing a long time ago! SOLD
Jeff
